ai-ne35:2.3_0: and right view at the fore.
ai-ne35:2.6_0: they’ve given up all bad rebirths.”
ai-ne35:3.1_0: “Lack of mind, we’re protected by good deeds, verbal, and mental deeds.”
ai-ne35:3.4_0: For right view gives rise to right thought. Right thought gives rise to right speech. Right speech gives rise to right action. Right action gives rise to right livelihood. Right livelihood gives rise to right effort. Right effort gives rise to right mindfulness. Right mindfulness gives rise to right immersion. Right immersion gives rise to right knowledge and vision. Right knowledge gives rise to right freedom.
ai-ne35:3.5_0: This person is like the Emancipation-element which has no basis for attachment remaining.
ai-ne35:3.6_0: The one committed, having entered upon the camptiness,
ai-ne35:5.1_0: “ first dwelling is the first dwelling
ai-ne35:5.2_0: As to direction, it lies in the direction.
